State-owned Indian Oil, the largest oil company in India, operating 10 of the country's 20 refineries, has purchased at least 5 million barrels of American oil. This was reported by Bloomberg.

India says fuck you to the felon president #trump and his hookah’s for tariffs and sanctions.
